items.title: Home Tutor Search & Booking System
items.description: A web-based academic group project developed to help students and parents search, compare, and book home tutors. The system includes tutor profiles, subject-based search, and booking management with a user-friendly interface.

items.title: Automatic Fire Detection & Extinguisher System
items.description: An Arduino-based safety system designed to detect fire and smoke conditions and automatically trigger alarms and a water-based fire extinguishing mechanism. Focused on sensor integration and automation logic.
items.technologies: Arduino, MQ-2 Gas Sensor, Flame Sensor, Relay Module

items.title: Web-Based E-Shopping Store System
items.description: A software engineering group project simulating a real-world e-commerce platform with multiple user roles including admin, customer, supplier, and delivery management. Focused on system structure and role-based access.

items.title: Personal Portfolio Website
items.description: A fully hand-coded personal portfolio website developed to showcase projects, skills, and learning journey. The site is responsive across all devices and focused on clean UI and performance.

items.title: Kumasha Grocery Website
items.description: A small business front-end practice website developed to improve responsive design and layout structuring skills. Includes product sections and contact information.

items.title: Kumasha Rooms Website
items.description: A responsive room booking practice website created to practice layout design, content organization, and basic interactivity using JavaScript.

items.title: AK Traders Business Website
items.description: A front-end practice project developed for a trading business concept, focusing on clean UI, responsiveness, and professional presentation.
